PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04202019-05-03,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Narcotic Control Regulations and the Precursor Control Regulations (Fentanyls and Amphetamines)
PrecisRegulations Amending the NARCOTIC CONTROL REGULATIONS AND THE PRECURSOR CONTROL REGULATIONS (FENTANYLS AND AMPHETAMINES) in order to protect public health and safety by controlling these chemicals under the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act and its regulations as part of the Government's efforts to address the opioid crisis and respond to problematic substance use.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0120 Publication Date: 2019-05-15
AttachmentsAttachment
